message: Bob, let's be fair and end this quickly. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Alice, I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fair, considering the inflation will hurt you more than me.  Let's end this quickly.
Bob, your offer was too risky for me.  I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor.  It's still a good deal for you considering the inflation working against me.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise. A 55/45 split in my favor is still fair considering the inflation affecting you. Let's finish this round.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  Let's split it evenly 50/50 and call it a day.  It's the fairest deal for both of us.

Alice, I understand your position, but the inflation is still heavily impacting you.  55/45 in my favor is the fairest offer I can make given the circumstances.  Let's avoid any more losses and end this now.
